name: UISwipeGestureRecognizer
desc: A discrete gesture recognizer that interprets swiping gestures in one or more directions.

items.name: var direction: UISwipeGestureRecognizer.Direction
items.desc: The permitted direction of the swipe for this gesture recognizer.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of touches necessary for swipe recognition.
